General.Name: ToolGen Inc.
General.Description: ToolGen Incorporated, a biotechnology company, focuses on the development of genome editing technology. Its products include gRNA/Cas9 purified, which provides ready-to-use reagents for genome engineering experiments; gRNA/Cas9 plasmid that offers tools for genome editing experiment; and recombinant Cas9 protein, which offers ready-to-use reagents for genome engineering experiments. The company also offers genome-edited cell line; genome-edited mouse/rat; and genome-edited plant services, as well as surrogate reporter synthesis and in-del analysis services. Its products are used in research applications. ToolGen Incorporated was founded in 1999 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: #1204, Byucksan Digital Valley 6-cha, Seoul, South Korea
